类 WorldFrame<T>

                      info.gridworld.gui.WorldFrame<T>
所有已实现的接口：
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class WorldFrame<T>
extends javax.swing.JFrame

The WorldFrame displays a World and allows manipulation of its occupants.
This code is not tested on the AP CS A and AB exams. It contains GUI implementation details that are not intended to be understood by AP CS students.

另请参见：
序列化表格

          Nested class that is registered as the handler for exceptions on the Swing event thread.

构造方法详细信息

WorldFrame

public WorldFrame(World<T> world)
Constructs a WorldFrame that displays the occupants of a world

参数：
world - the world to display
方法详细信息

repaint

public void repaint()
覆盖：
类 java.awt.Component 中的 repaint

getWorld

public World<T> getWorld()
Gets the world that this frame displays

返回：
the world

setGrid

public void setGrid(Grid<T> newGrid)
Sets a new grid for this world. Occupants are transferred from the old world to the new.

参数：
newGrid - the new grid

showError

public void showError(java.lang.Throwable t,
                      java.lang.String resource)
Displays an error message

参数：
t - the throwable that describes the error
resource - the resource whose .text/.title strings should be used in the dialog

setRunMenuItemsEnabled

public void setRunMenuItemsEnabled(boolean enable)
Sets the enabled status of those menu items that are disabled when running.

参数：
enable - true to enable the menus
